WRITING.TEXT: Thank you!
Thanks! :)
Thanks man! We stick together! We got this
Thank you 3
Yeah I tend to just use it for protein now mate!
She's absolutely wonderful, beautiful in every way! I'm punching above my weight!
That was my friend just being himself. He had the tightest shorts imaginable. We told him not to wear them, he wore them anyway. Think he got sunburnt and they were sticking!
Thank you! Honestly you've all been so lovely and I've tried to reply to every single person, you're all fantastic. Thanks again! 3
Exactly mate! Big journey ahead but I can look back and be proud so far!
Going into my first year of secondary school, being surrounded by hundreds of new people making my anxiety worse, which made my eating worse!
Aha thanks lad! Was a good week, for some! Thanks a lot though man!
Thank you very fucking much 3
Thank you my friend, I needed to hear that 3 thank you!
Thank you!

I started the 5x5 SL challenge on the app (iPhone). It asked me what previous weightlifting experience I had. When I clicked "none" it preselected me a starting weight for each exercise, deadlift has always been 2.5kg under the squat. I could probably do more but since they do fairly similar muscles, and I do pull-ups as accessories, I don't really need to up the deadlift weight currently!
Think my forms slightly off as I find deadlift at 72.5kg a lot harder than 75kg squats!
Thank you dude!
Thank you! :)

I get the whole "oh gosh you're so lucky being skinny, you can eat whatever you like" yeah that's why I'm like this!
Well I hope everything for your friend works out okay. There's lots of things on the internet to use for help!

I would say the vast majority of it left me yeah! When Im in new situations like meeting new friend groups, new jobs i tend to have some anxiety but it leaves pretty quickly. Been at my job for 2 years almost, and i have the repuation for being the chatterbox!
Thank you! :)

Yeah exactly! Unfortunately with any mental illness, it isn't an exact science. Theres no ironclad cure, theres no shortcuts or emergency medication. Some people come out better than others, and im lucky for that. But because i came out better than others, i have to help spread that word around now. I need to give back the luck i received!
Thank you! I've done the hard work to get here, the harder work starts now! Thanks again for the kind words 3

Best advice i can give about the eyes is see atleast 3 different consultants. The surgeon is the dealbreaker, meet them, talk to them. Then decide what you want to do!
You've got this man, i expect to see a post from you in the future when you're finally where you want to be!

Yeah! I mean i hadn't worked out like, at all. So i still had the same (around about) muscle mass in the second picture than in the first. I had the gut but i had next to no weight other than that. Can see how it looks that way though!
It's not until you write the full list of everything you've done in the past few years, that you realise you've done ALOT of stuff! Thanks bro!
